data.name: Acoustic report
data.description: A report measuring the noise environment for a new development or its effect within a proposed development

data.name: Affordable housing statement
data.description: This statement should set out how the development scheme will comply with the local authorityâ€™s  affordable housing policy

data.name: Air quality assessment (AQA)
data.description: An assessment of the impact on air quality around the development and during the construction phase

data.name: Arboricultural impact assessment
data.description: A supporting report from an arboriculturist for any proposed work on trees - providing detail on the conditions of the trees on or next to the development site

data.name: Archaeological assessment
data.description: An evaluation to identify and assess the potential of an area to contain as-yet unrecorded archaeological sites

data.name: Biodiversity survey and report
data.description: Information on biodiversity interests and protected species and any possible impacts on them from the development, plus details of any measures proposed to mitigate or compensate for the impacts

data.name: Community infrastructure levy (CIL) form
data.description: A form that must be completed to determine whether the development is subject to a CIL payment

data.name: Condition of Trees
data.description: Written arboricultural advice
data.notes: Covers if tree is diseased, at risk of breaking or falling

data.name: Completed application form
data.description: The application form that must be completed for all planning applications, including the relevant sections and questions

data.name: Daylight and sunlight assessment
data.description: An assessment to evaluate the potential impact of a proposed development on the amount of natural light received by surrounding properties

data.name: Design and access statement
data.description: A report accompanying and supporting a planning application that explains how a proposed development is a suitable response to the site and its setting, and demonstrates that it can be adequately accessed by prospective users

data.name: Elevation - existing
data.description: What a building or structure currently looks like from the outside at a scale of 1:50 or 1:100

data.name: Elevation - proposed
data.description: Showing how the building will look after work has been carried out at a scale of 1:50 or 1:100

data.name: Energy statement
data.description: A detailed report about how a planned development will meet the energy efficiency standards set by the local planning authority

data.name: Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA)
data.notes: Required if the site exceeds certain thresholds or is near sensitive areas re onshore extraction of oil and gas

data.name: Environmental Statement
data.description: A statement setting out an assessment of the likely environmental effects of the proposed development - this is only required if the local planning authority deem the application to have environmental impacts after the Environmental Impact Assessment has been assessed
data.notes: Required by Development relating to the onshore extraction of oil and gas applications

data.name: Flood risk assessment
data.description: An assessment of flood risk that needs to be completed if the proposed development is within a flood risk zone to show the potential impacts of the development on flooding and propose mitigation, such as SuDs

data.name: Floor plan - existing
data.description: Floor plans showing the building as it is now, usually at a scale of 1:100, but can be 1:50 if done to maintain consistency from the elevation drawings

data.name: Floor plan - proposed
data.description: Floor plans showing the proposed changes to the building, usually at a scale of 1:100, but can be 1:50 if done to maintain consistency from the elevation drawings

data.name: Heritage impact assessment
data.description: If the site is close to a heritage asset or conservation area a report is needed to assess the effect of the proposed development on the significance of the heritage

data.name: Heritage statement
data.description: This statement describes a heritage asset, its significance and the proposed works that are being applied for

data.name: Hydrocarbon Licence
data.description: Proof of exploration rights from North Sea Transition Authority (NSTA)

data.name: Land contamination assessment
data.description: Report on potential land contamination issues - if contamination is found on site remediation and mitigation proposals will need to be included
data.notes: Needed if the site is known or suspected to be contaminated.

data.name: Landscaping plan
data.description: A plan of a site considering both soft-landscaping (natural elements like flowers, trees, and grass) as well as hard-landscaping (man-made features like lawn furniture, fountains, and sheds)

data.name: Lighting assessment
data.description: A lighting assessment is required for all applications that include use of floodlighting or a significant amount of external lighting

data.name: Location plan
data.description: A location plan that shows the site outlined clearly in red in relation to the surrounding area, at a scale of 1:1250 or 1:2500, showing at least 2 named roads and surrounding land and buildings. A blue line must be drawn around any other land owned by the applicant close to or adjoining the application site

data.name: Noise and Traffic Assessment
data.description: Evaluates operational impact on surrounding communities

data.name: Noise assessment
data.description: A report that assesses the impact of noise from the proposed development on the surrounding area

data.name: Site photographs
data.description: Pictures to show the existing context and condition of the site and surrounding area

data.name: Planning statement
data.description: The statement identifies the context and need for a proposed development, and assesses how the development is in accordance with the relevant national and local policies

data.name: Roof plan - existing
data.description: Drawing showing the roof as it is now

data.name: Roof plan - proposed
data.description: Drawing showing the proposed changes to the roof

data.name: Schedule of Works
data.notes: required by Camden for all lbc applications

data.name: Section - existing
data.description: A plan that shows an existing vertical cut through a building or site, revealing the interior and exterior profiles

data.name: Section - proposed
data.description: A plan that shows the proposed vertical cut through a building or site, revealing the interior and exterior profiles

data.name: Site plan
data.description: A site plan that shows the proposed development in relation to the site boundaries and other existing buildings at a scale of 1:200 or 1:500 is advised
data.notes: general requirement. For extraction of oil and gas needs to Needed to show site layout, access, and safety zones

data.name: Site restoration plan
data.notes: Required under UK planning conditions to ensure post-production remediation

data.name: Sketch Plan
data.description: Often a plan showing the position of the trees listed in an application

data.name: Statement of community involvement (SCI)
data.description: Sets out how residents and businesses have been involved in the design and development process of the proposals

data.name: Structural damage report
data.description: A report that relates specifically to the structural condition of the property if it has been affected by nearby trees
data.notes: Mentioned in "Trees - Addtional information" section of tree works form

data.name: Subsidence Report
data.description: A report by an engineer or surveyor describing damage, vegetation, soil, roots, and repair proposals

data.name: Transport assessment or statement
data.description: A description and analysis of the existing transport conditions and details of the expected impact of the proposed development on the local transportation system

data.name: Travel plan
data.description: A package of actions to encourage safe, healthy and sustainable travel options for a new development

data.name: Ecology Assessment
data.description: A document to identify how protection of biodiversity and habitat quality will be achieved and enhanced, where possible.

data.name: Fire statement
data.description: A report that sets out how the proposal handles the fire safety aspects, including details of fire safety measures, access for firefighting, and evacuation plans.

data.name: Sustainability statement
data.description: A report that outlines how the development will meet sustainability objectives, including energy efficiency, water conservation, and waste management.

data.name: Biodiveristy Net Gain Metric
data.description: A metric used to assess the biodiversity value of a site before and after development, ensuring that the development results in a net gain for biodiversity.
